Articles.Content: Following the events of the Chobit Scare, started by redwolfy, the Seal Army has now made an icey planet named Polaris a new home. In this thread, I will be posting how well the Polaris colonies are doing. Currently cities are being constructed on the continent of Shachonia.

With chobit deciding to club baby seals, factories on Polaris have been constructed, and are now making weapons. The Plague I, Plague II, Plague III, and Excalibur I orbital cannons have been deployed.
I don't think I'll even give this thread the benefit of a proper response.

It makes sense in context. Well, only a small amount of sense, but sense.

Yeah. That's what I think of this war. I'm going rouge.
His face is now rouge . Anyway, ShachonianX, how will you destroy chobits fleet? And prevent the nuclear explosion killing you?

With chobit deciding to club baby seals....

Why would you want to hurt baby seals? They're so dang cute!
Thread closed, if you want this reopened please PM me what it is about ShachonianX.
